== Auto Pilot Testing ==
 This page holds the master table of what applications are used by the various flavours of the ubuntu family.
/!\ If you add a new application, ensure it is added alphabetically!

Key to table:

* Ed = Edubuntu.
* Ku = Kubuntu.
* Lu = Lubuntu.
* My = Mythbuntu.
* Nt = Netboot.
* Ub = Ubuntu.
* UG = UbuntuGNOME.
* UK = UbuntuKylin.
* USv = Ubuntu Server.
* Ust = Ubuntu Studio.
* UT = Ubuntu Touch.
* Xu = Xubuntu.
* Exists? = Does an Auto Pilot test case exist.
* Works? = Does the Auto Pilot test case work.
